content: from docs: only positive feedback. Imperio is happy to meet

tmandry: I think for async it'd be interesting to understand quantitatively what people are using async for and how good they think it is for each use case. This can use the existing "technology domains" question, but as the question notes it can be ambiguous how to answer

tmandry: It might be useful to break that question into two.. what kind of machine does your application run on (server/pc/mobile/IoT or smart home/embedded) and what kind of "UI" does it have (web/native app/cli/...)
